methods.name: transferOwnership
methods.desc: Transfers the ownership of the contract to a new owner.Requires the caller to be the current owner.

args.name: newOwner
args.desc: The address of the new owner.

methods.name: deploy
methods.desc: Deploy the Partner Factory, setting the transaction sender as the owner

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Allows the owner to update the smart contract

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc: Destroy the smart contract, sending all Algo to the owner account

events.name: OwnershipTransferred
events.desc: Event emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.
